<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:4a5634841b71e51080feea02f54bcbb7=Conference Center^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Room Reservation">fdc27c801b71e51080feea02f54bcb3f</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	// Meeting Planning Company
g_form.setMandatory('meeting_planning_company',false);
g_form.setMandatory('are_you_w_company',false);
g_form.setMandatory('comp_name',false);
//g_form.setMandatory('company_name',false);
//g_form.setMandatory('company_name1',false);
g_form.setDisplay('meeting_planning_company',false);	
	//Meeting Planning Company

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
		// Meeting Planning Company
g_form.setDisplay('meeting_planning_company',true);	
	//g_form.setMandatory('meeting_planning_company',true);
g_form.setMandatory('are_you_w_company',true);
g_form.setMandatory('comp_name',false);
g_form.setVisible('comp_name',false);
//g_form.setMandatory('company_name1',true);

	//Meeting Planning Company
	
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Conference center Meeting Planning Company</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bassem</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-24 16:06:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a96f1dd91bb12d1080feea02f54bcb00</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Conference center Meeting Planning Company</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OWS Meet" source="x_g_nioa_ows_meet">c67fe0cc1b31e51080feea02f54bcb32</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OWS Meet">c67fe0cc1b31e51080feea02f54bcb32</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_a96f1dd91bb12d1080feea02f54bcb00</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bassem</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-21 20:27:47</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
